Regal Oriental Hotel ‘LOVE KOWLOON CITY’ Photo Shooting Competition
Kowloon City – it was once where the old Kai Tak Airport in Hong Kong was located. This place is filled with the good memories of many Hong Kong people and is also a hidden gem in Hong Kong, where one can discover a wide array of traditional stores, eateries with unique characteristic, and a plethora of historical and cultural attractions.
The new Kai Tak Cruise Terminal is one of the major highlights in this fast developing East Kowloon area, which is exactly built on the former runway of the old Kai Tak Airport. To enjoy the serenity in the hustle and bustle of city life, one can explore the Kowloon Walled City Park, which is built on the former “Walled City” of Kowloon City and boasts over 31,000 sq. m. greenery space. You can also explore the nearby famous historical spots including Sung Wong Toi and Hau Wong Temple.
To promote this hidden gem of Hong Kong and let more people know more about Kowloon City, Regal Oriental Hotel presents you the ‘LOVE KOWLOON CITY Photo S hooting C ompetition’ from 8 August to 30 October 2015 .
You can simply use your mobile phone or camera and snap a photo which tells any story about Kowloon City and then upload the photo to the facebook or instagram fan page of Regal Oriental Hotel for participating . The Champion, the first runner-up and the second runner-up – the most creative one will be entitled to a free dinner buffet for two persons at Regal Oriental Hotel . Join now and encourage your friends to help promote Hong Kong and shar e every exciting moment in this hidden gem of Hong Kong – Kowloon City!
